assetProfile.address1: Crossroads of Jahra Road and Airport Roa
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: National Industries Company - KPSC engages in the manufacturing and marketing of building materials and infrastructure products in Kuwait. The company operates in two segments, Building Materials and Contracting Services, and Investments. It offers interlock, yard tiles, kerbstone, garden benches, and flower pots; cement cladding and limestone bricks; cladding material; decorative bricks; AAC, cement blocks. The company also provides PPR fittings, cPVC and uPVC pressure fittings, uPVC sewerage and drainage systems, uPVC conduit pipes and accessories, and uPVC cable ducts. In addition, it offers engineering supervision services related to the oil and gas companies. The company was formerly known as National Industries Company for Building Materials - SAK (Closed) and changed its name to National Industries Company - KPSC in March 2008. National Industries Company - KPSC was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
